.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx8_soffset_32c2a9:

soffset
=======

An unsigned byte offset, which is added to the base address to get the memory address.

*Size:* 1 dword.

*Operands:* :ref:`m0<amdgpu_synid_m0>`, :ref:`uimm20<amdgpu_synid_uimm20>`
